title.rendered: Do’s and Don’ts During an Interview

content.rendered:
If you have an upcoming interview you may want to watch this quick video for some tips and pointers, maybe you’ve heard them before and maybe you’re hearing them for the first time, either way it’s never a bad idea to have a refresher course right before an interview.

<iframe loading="lazy" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/edOZ1S9M3MI" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>
